title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:particle'
- Spawns particles on the body of the entity that has the power for visual effects.

particle.description: The particle type that will be spawned.

frequency.description: Determines how often the particles should spawn (interval in ticks).

visible_in_first_person.description: Determines whether the particle should be visible in first person.
